segment.source: Surface
segment.target: Surface

segment.source: Purpose
segment.target: Purpose

segment.source: This library provides guidance to help you deploy Windows on Surface devices, keep those devices up to date, and easily manage and support Surface devices in your organization.
segment.target: This library provides guidance to help you deploy Windows on Surface devices, keep those devices up to date, and easily manage and support Surface devices in your organization.

segment.source: For more information on planning for, deploying, and managing Surface devices in your organization, see the Surface TechCenter.
segment.target: For more information on planning for, deploying, and managing Surface devices in your organization, see the Surface TechCenter.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Advanced UEFI security features for Surface Pro 3
segment.target: Advanced UEFI security features for Surface Pro 3

segment.source: Find out how to install and configure the v3.11.760.0 UEFI update to enable additional security options for Surface Pro 3 devices.
segment.target: Find out how to install and configure the v3.11.760.0 UEFI update to enable additional security options for Surface Pro 3 devices.

segment.source: Customize the OOBE for Surface deployments
segment.target: Customize the OOBE for Surface deployments

segment.source: Walk through the process of customizing the Surface out-of-box experience for end users in your organization.
segment.target: Walk through the process of customizing the Surface out-of-box experience for end users in your organization.

segment.source: Deploy Surface app with Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Deploy Surface app with Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Find out how to add and download Surface app with Windows Store for Business, as well as install Surface app with PowerShell and MDT.
segment.target: Find out how to add and download Surface app with Windows Store for Business, as well as install Surface app with PowerShell and MDT.

segment.source: Download the latest firmware and drivers for Surface devices
segment.target: Download the latest firmware and drivers for Surface devices

segment.source: Get a list of the available downloads for Surface devices and links to download the drivers and firmware for your device.
segment.target: Get a list of the available downloads for Surface devices and links to download the drivers and firmware for your device.

segment.source: Enable PEAP, EAP-FAST, and Cisco LEAP on Surface devices
segment.target: Enable PEAP, EAP-FAST, and Cisco LEAP on Surface devices

segment.target: Find out how to enable support for PEAP, EAP-FAST, or Cisco LEAP protocols on your Surface device.

segment.target: Ethernet adapters and Surface deployment

segment.source: Get guidance and answers to help you perform a network deployment to Surface devices.
segment.target: Get guidance and answers to help you perform a network deployment to Surface devices.

segment.target: Manage Surface Dock firmware updates

segment.target: Read about the different methods you can use to manage the process of Surface Dock firmware updates.

segment.target: Manage Surface driver and firmware updates

segment.source: Explore the available options to manage firmware and driver updates for Surface devices.
segment.target: Explore the available options to manage firmware and driver updates for Surface devices.

segment.source: Manage Surface UEFI settings
segment.target: Manage Surface UEFI settings

segment.source: Use Surface UEFI settings to enable or disable devices, configure security settings, and adjust Surface device boot settings.
segment.target: Use Surface UEFI settings to enable or disable devices, configure security settings, and adjust Surface device boot settings.

segment.target: Surface Data Eraser

segment.target: Find out how the Microsoft Surface Data Eraser tool can help you securely wipe data from your Surface devices.

segment.target: Surface Deployment Accelerator

segment.target: See how Microsoft Surface Deployment Accelerator provides a quick and simple deployment mechanism for organizations to reimage Surface devices.
